subtests.name: Overall test
WebGL test #0: getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : uniform1i can set a sampler uniform
WebGL test #1: getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : uniform1iv can set a sampler uniform
WebGL test #2: getError was expected value: INVALID_OPERATION : uniform1f returns INVALID_OPERATION if attempting to set a sampler uniform
WebGL test #3: getError was expected value: INVALID_OPERATION : uniform1fv returns INVALID_OPERATION if attempting to set a sampler uniform
WebGL test #4: uniform1i works for any valid texture unit
WebGL test #5: uniform1iv works for any valid texture unit
WebGL test #6: uniform1i generates INVALID_VALUE for invalid texture units 0x10 to 0x1010
WebGL test #7: uniform1iv generates INVALID_VALUE for invalid texture units 0x10 to 0x1010
